sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些前置词均可表示位置"在……下面"之意。
means: below ： 指位置低于某物或在某物下方，但不一定在正下方，所指范围较宽。
beneath ： 书面用词，指紧挨……之下，其反义词是on。
under ： 普通用词，与over相对，指在某物的正下方，含垂直在下的意思。
underneath ： 书面口语均用，也常与beneath和under换用，但更含遮蔽的意味。

list.explanation: 失宠的，受怀疑的，名誉扫地的

example.en: He has been somewhat under a cloud since they found the corpse in his closet.
example.zh: 自从他们在他的壁橱里找到那具尸体之后，他就一直受到怀疑。

list.explanation: 处于半昏迷状态的，不省人事的

example.en: I was half under and could hear what the doctor was saying.
example.zh: 那时我处于半昏迷状态，还能听到医生在说些什么。

example.en: He was half under when they pulled him out.
example.zh: 他们把他拽出来时，他已不省人事了。

example.en: Poor Fred was half under and still had to give a speech.
example.zh: 可怜的弗雷德已经有点醉怠了，但他还是不得不发一次言。

list.explanation: 处于受支配地位的，任人摆布的

example.en: The Criminal Justice Act would have all the villains under the cosh.
example.zh: 刑事审判法将使所有恶棍都俯首贴耳。

means.word_mean: 在…下面, 在…底下; 在（或到、通过）…下面

sentences.en: They lay down under the shade of a tree.
sentences.cn: 他们躺在一棵树的树阴下。

sentences.en: The village nestles under the hill.
sentences.cn: 那村庄紧靠在山脚下。

sentences.en: All this happened under his eye.
sentences.cn: 这一切都发生在他的眼皮底下。

sentences.en: She was carrying her handbag under her armpit when I saw her.
sentences.cn: 我看到她时, 她腋下夹着手提包。

sentences.en: The old chair suddenly folded up under him.
sentences.cn: 那张旧椅子让他一坐突然被压垮了。

sentences.en: This field has been laid under grass.
sentences.cn: 这块地已经长满了草。

sentences.en: The soldiers stood firm under gunfire of the enemy.
sentences.cn: 士兵在敌人的炮火下不屈不挠。

means.word_mean: 少于, 低于, 小于, 不足, 比…年轻

sentences.en: His income is under ￡2000 a year.
sentences.cn: 他每年的收入不到两千英镑。

sentences.en: It is under the original.
sentences.cn: 这低于原价。

sentences.en: He cannot be under thirty years of age.
sentences.cn: 他的年龄不会小于三十岁。

sentences.en: It took us under a day.
sentences.cn: 我们用了不到一天的时间。

means.word_mean: 在…情况下, 在…过程中

sentences.en: The car is under repairs.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车在修理中。

sentences.en: Don't overload your lecture with details that do not bear on the topic under discussion.
sentences.cn: 讲课时不要过多地谈与本题无关的细节。

means.word_mean: 在…管辖下; 在…影响下; 由…控制（或管理、经营）

sentences.en: She has three secretaries under her.
sentences.cn: 她手下有三名秘书。

sentences.en: The army is under the command of General Smith.
sentences.cn: 这支部队由史密斯将军指挥。

sentences.en: We learned a great deal under her teaching.
sentences.cn: 在她的教导下我们学到了很多东西。

sentences.en: This falls under the head rhetoric.
sentences.cn: 这个属于修辞学项目。

means.word_mean: 使用(某名称), 用或以（某一名字）

sentences.en: He never wrote under his real name.
sentences.cn: 他从来不用真名实姓写作。

sentences.en: He didn't attend that meeting under the pretext of sickness.
sentences.cn: 他以生病为借口, 没参加那个会议。

means.word_mean: 根据…的条款; 根据, 按照（协议、法律或制度）

sentences.en: Under the terms of the agreement, you have to pay a weekly rent.
sentences.cn: 根据这份协议的条款, 你得支付一周的房租。

means.word_mean: 在…项下；在（书等中的）某部份
在昏迷中；陷入昏迷状态

sentence.cn: 最多两个五岁以下的孩子可以和付费客户一起免费旅行。
sentence.en: Up to two children under ago five may travel free with a paying customer.
sentence.from: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

sentence.cn: 太阳能仍然通过在塑料下建造温室来工作。
sentence.en: The solar still works by creating a greenhouse under the plastic.
sentence.from: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

jx.jx_en_mean: Having gotten free of worries or difficulties

lj.lj_ly: Credit counseling helped us get out from under.
lj.lj_ls: 信用咨询使我们免除了忧虑

entry.def: If a person or thing is under something, they are at a lower level than that thing, and may be covered or hidden by it.

example.ex: They found a labyrinth of tunnels under the ground.
example.tran: 他们发现了一处迷宫似的地道。

example.ex: ...swimming in the pool or lying under an umbrella...
example.tran: 在泳池里游泳或躺在阳伞底下

entry.def: In a place such as a sea, river, or swimming pool, if someone or something is under the water, they are fully in the water and covered by it.

example.ex: They said he'd been held under the water and drowned...
example.tran: 他们说他被按到水里淹死了。

example.ex: Goldfish were swimming lazily in a group just under the surface.
example.tran: 金鱼聚在一起贴着水面懒洋洋地游着。

entry.def: If you go under something, you move from one side to the other of something that is at a higher level than you.

example.ex: He went under a brick arch...
example.tran: 他穿过一个砖砌的拱门。

example.ex: A river boat passed under the bridge.
example.tran: 一条内河船从桥下经过。

entry.def: Something that is under a layer of something, especially clothing, is covered by that layer.
entry.tran: 在（尤指一层衣服）的里面（或底下)

example.ex: I was wearing two sweaters under the green army jacket...
example.tran: 我在绿军装里套了两件毛线衫。

example.ex: He had no shirt on under his thin jumper...
example.tran: 他在薄套头衫里面没有穿衬衣。

entry.def: You can use under before a noun to indicate that a person or thing is being affected by something or is going through a particular process.

example.ex: ...fishermen whose livelihoods are under threat...
example.tran: 生计受到威胁的渔夫

example.ex: I'm rarely under pressure and my co-workers are always nice to me...
example.tran: 我很少感受到压力，同事们一直对我很好。

entry.def: If something happens under particular circumstances or conditions, it happens when those circumstances or conditions exist.

example.ex: His best friend was killed by police under extremely questionable circumstances...
example.tran: 他最好的朋友在极其可疑的情况下被警察打死了。

example.ex: Under normal conditions, only about 20 to 40 per cent of vitamin E is absorbed...
example.tran: 正常情况下，仅有20%到40%的维生素E会被吸收。

entry.def: If something happens under a law, agreement, or system, it happens because that law, agreement, or system says that it should happen.
entry.tran: 根据，按照，依照（法律、协定、制度等）

example.ex: Under law, your employer has the right to hire a temporary worker to replace you...
example.tran: 根据法律规定，你的雇主有权雇用一名临时工来代替你。

example.ex: We believe an offence was committed under EU regulations...
example.tran: 我们认为根据欧盟有关规定已经构成了犯罪。

entry.def: If something happens under a particular person or government, it happens when that person or government is in power.
entry.tran: 在（…领导）下；在（…当政）期间；在（…统治）之下

example.ex: There would be no new taxes under his leadership.
example.tran: 在他主政期间不会增加新税种。

example.ex: ...the realities of life under a brutal dictatorship...
example.tran: 残暴的独裁统治下的生活现实

entry.def: If you study or work under a particular person, that person teaches you or tells you what to do.
entry.tran: 在…指导下(学习)；在…手下(工作)

example.ex: Kiefer was just one of the artists who had studied under Beuys in the early Sixties...
example.tran: 基弗只是60年代早期师从博伊斯的艺术家之一。

example.ex: General Lewis Hyde had served under General 'Billy' Mitchell...
example.tran: 刘易斯·海德将军曾是“比利”·米切尔将军的部下。

entry.def: If you do something under a particular name, you use that name instead of your real name.
entry.tran: 用（…之名）；以（…的名义）；假借（…之名）

example.ex: Were any of your books published under the name Amanda Fairchild?...
example.tran: 你们所出版的书里有署名为阿曼达·费尔柴尔德的吗？

example.ex: The patient was registered under a false name.
example.tran: 那位患者挂号时用了假名。

entry.def: You use under to say which section of a list, book, or system something is in.

example.ex: This study is described under 'General Diseases of the Eye'...
example.tran: “普通眼科疾病”这一部分里对该项研究作了描述。

example.ex: ...a parental rights order under section 4 of the Family Law Reform Act...
example.tran: 《家庭法改革法案》第4款中有关父母权利的规定

entry.def: If something or someone is under a particular age or amount, they are less than that age or amount.
entry.tran: （年龄或数量）不足，低于，在…以下

example.ex: ...jobs for those under 65...
example.tran: 适合65岁以下人群从事的工作

example.ex: Nearly half of mothers with children under five have a job...
example.tran: 孩子不满5岁的妈妈中近一半有工作。

means.word_mean: 1. located below or beneath something else;
2. lower in rank, power, or authority;
1. down to defeat, death, or ruin;

sentences.sentence: "children six and under will be admitted free"

means.word_mean: 4. in or into a state of subordination or subjugation;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, of Germanic origin: related to Dutch onder and German unter

sentences.en: The boat lay under several feet of water.

sentences.cn: 男：现在的情况很清楚，全欧洲的海岸线消失在水下不过是时间问题。
sentences.en: M:  It is clear now that it’s a matter of time before the entire European coastline disappears under water.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 它能帮助潜水员在水下看得清楚,因为它有玻璃或塑料 “ 眼镜 ”.
sentences.en: It helps the diver to see clearly under water because it has glass or plastic " windows "

sentences.cn: 那个人能在水下呆1分多钟.
sentences.en: The man can remain under water for more than a minute.

sentences.cn: 它们在水下用长在头部两侧的鳃呼吸.
sentences.en: They breathe under water with the gills on the sides of their heads.

sentences.cn: 打捞器具:用于在水下搜寻、打捞或疏浚的设备, 如钩锚.
sentences.en: A device, such as a grappling hook , that is used for dragging under water.

sentences.cn: 实际上, 河马一口气可以在水下呆六分钟.
sentences.en: In fact, a hippo can stay under water for up to six minutes.

sentences.cn: 当敌人的探照灯扫过江面时, 那两名泅水过江的侦察员设法躲在水下.
sentences.en: The two scouts, swimming across the river, managed to keep under as the enemy's searchlight raked the surface.

sentences.cn: 死去的人的尸体在水下拖着另一个人.
sentences.en: The bodies of the ones who died dragged the others under the water.

sentences.cn: 它可以用于回转式机器,也可以在水下应用.
sentences.en: It can be used on rotating machinery and under water.

sentences.cn: 孩子们在还没有学会走路就已经能熟练地在水下屏住呼吸.
sentences.en: Children become expert at holding their breath under water even before they can walk.

sentences.cn: 许多人都将在水下生活和工作.
sentences.en: A lot of people will live and work under the water, too.

sentences.cn: 部分结构在水下的建筑怎么说?
sentences.en: What about structures that are partly under water?

sentences.cn: 玻璃在水下被杵和臼碾压.
sentences.en: This glass is ground under water using pestle and mortar.

sentences.cn: 作为一名潜水员, 他每天在水下工作好几个小时.
sentences.en: As a diver, he worked several hours a day under the water.

sentences.cn: 在水下. 所有的东西不是蓝色就是绿色的,白天. 水下到处都是光线.
sentences.en: Here . under the water. everything is blue and green . during the day. there is much light.

sentences.cn: 在去年夏天水灾期间, 一片广阔的农田都淹在水下.
sentences.en: During last summer's flood, a large tract of farmland was under water.

sentences.cn: 那艘装上了核发动装置的潜水艇能在水下停留数月.
sentences.en: The submarine to which an atomic engine is fitted can stay under water for months.

sentences.cn: 她仅试了三次就把狗控制在水下了.
sentences.en: It only took her three tries to keep her dog under water.

sentences.cn: 可是, 潜水员携带一根通气管就可以在水下呆很长时间.
sentences.en: With a snorkel, however, a diver can stay under water for quite a long time.

sentences.cn: 我们在水下潜游了很长一段路,然后浮上水面透口气.
sentences.en: We swam a long way under water and then came up for air.

sentences.cn: 这位游泳者能在水下呆1分多钟.
sentences.en: The swimmer can remain under for more than a minute.

sentences.cn: 导线如果放在水下, 电流就会全部漏掉.
sentences.en: If a wire was laid under water, the current would all leak away.

sentences.cn: 游泳的人不能在水下游太久, 因为他必须呼吸.
sentences.en: A swimmer can't swim under water very long, because he must take a breath.

sentences.cn: 因为氧气不足,所以我们不能继续呆在水下了.
sentences.en: We have no enough oxygen so we can no longer remain under water.

sentences.cn: 介绍了在水下进行激光切割时影响切割质量的几种因素.
sentences.en: Some factors which influence the cutting quality of the workpiece are introduced when cutting under water.

sentences.cn: 他学习在水下吐气.
sentences.en: He learns to breathe out under water.

sentences.cn: 我正好在水下, 事实上没有去大海更更多底部!
sentences.en: I went right under water. There no bottom to the sea any more!

sentences.cn: 人不能在水下呼吸.
sentences.en: Man cannot breathe under water.

sentences.cn: 通过这些贷款, 可以利用一个更大的数额相对较低的利率.
sentences.en: Under this loan plan , you can obtain a bigger amount at comparatively cheap rates.

sentences.cn: 较低的小翼被稍微加大,以在车底的气流上有更好的管理.
sentences.en: The lower winglet has been slightly enlarged to better manage airflow passing under the car.

sentences.cn: 下面的一层
sentences.en: the under layer

sentences.cn: 两个共振峰下面的面积是不相等的.
sentences.en: The areas under the two resonance envelopes are unequal.

sentences.cn: 根据联邦法律, 适于航行水域下面的土地属于国家.
sentences.en: Under federal law, the lands under navigable waters belong to states.

sentences.cn: 你看见墙角桌子下面的那只猫 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can you see the cat under the table in corner?

sentences.cn: 排水沟把雨水排到了街道下面的系列管道中.
sentences.en: Gutters carried off the rainwater into a series of channels under the street.

sentences.cn: 在“用户界面编辑器”中, 选择“安装”下面的“启动”节点.
sentences.en: In the User Interface Editor, select the Start node under Install.

sentences.cn: 病人常常感到管型下面的皮肤瘙痒.
